body.p: The list below is just some suggestions made by various members of the GStreamer community. We are more than happy for students to make proposals based on their own wishes and ideas instead of using any of these suggestions. The important part for us is that you are motivated and that you put good work into writing a good and detailed proposal and that you try to interact with us from the start. Try to early find a possible mentor and shape your proposal (e.g. using Google docs).
body.h1: List of Summer of Code project ideas for students

ul.li: Plugins
GStreamer & OpenGL: Project ideas for improving OpenGL support in GStreamer
OpenCV Gesture Detection: Improve the OpenCV plugin for gesture detection (eg: hand gesture) and add more OpenCV plugins
DASH WebM support: Implement a plugin to do WebM DASH streaming based on the existing MP4 DASH plugin.
Windows Support: Improve Wasapi, MediaFoundation, d3dvideosink and other Windows-specific plugins.
zRTP Support: Write plugins to support zRTP
Chapter Support: Implement chapter support in more plugins
Improved Subtitle support: Work on subtitle support in Muxers, for example adding XSUB support
Editing Plugins: Wrapping popular audio/video filters as GStreamer plugins.
Framework
GstPlayer: Extended it into a set of minimalistic official GStreamer players for all the supported platforms.
Orc Acceleration: Extend use of the Orc optimizations in GStreamer to ARM 64bits
Static compilation for Orc: compile assembly code generated by Orc at build time
Bindings
GStreamer-Rust: Bindings for the Rust programming language.
GStreamer-Lua: GStreamer Lua bindings enhancement
GStreamer-Java enhancement: GStreamer Java bindings enhancement, JNI based bindings that work better in Android than Java-GNOME.
GStreamer-Haskell: Port bindings to being generated automatically via gobject-introspection and to 1.x.
Applications

Students can propose work on applications that use GStreamer if this work will involve enhancing the GStreamer framework as well. For example writing a new feature in Pitivi that requires new API in the gst-editing-services or extending Buzztrax by writing music related GStreamer plugins.
